Articles.Content:
I found this while looking online, and I thought it would be useful for those(like me) who aren't super sure about how to do planetary rendezvous. I recommend that everyone takes a look at this E-book, because it contains mist of the formulas you need for various maneuvers.

http://www.scribd.com/mobile/doc/77582154?width=320

Edit: I have no idea if this is the mobile version, so it would be great if someone could check that.

Edited August 17, 2012 by EDF
